name: Smartsheet
description: Integrate with Smartsheet to list, get, add and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Sheets
tools.description: List all sheets accessible to the authenticated Smartsheet user. Returns sheet names, IDs, and modification dates.

tools.name: Get Sheet
tools.description: Retrieve a Smartsheet sheet with its columns and rows. Returns structured data for analysis.

tools.name: Add Rows
tools.description: Add one or more rows to a Smartsheet sheet. Each row specifies cell values mapped to column IDs.

tools.name: Update Rows
tools.description: Update existing rows in a Smartsheet sheet. Each row specifies the row ID and new cell values.

tools.name: Search
tools.description: Search across all Smartsheet sheets for a query string. Returns matching sheets, rows, and cell values.
